  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  RobotPoseEstimator.PoseStrategy
    Deprecated.
    LOWEST_AMBIGUITY: Choose the Pose with the lowest ambiguity CLOSEST_TO_CAMERA_HEIGHT: Choose the Pose which is closest to the camera height CLOSEST_TO_REFERENCE_POSE: Choose the Pose which is closest to the pose from setReferencePose() CLOSEST_TO_LAST_POSE: Choose the Pose which is closest to the last pose calculated

    • RobotPoseEstimator

      public RobotPoseEstimator​(edu.wpi.first.apriltag.AprilTagFieldLayout aprilTags, RobotPoseEstimator.PoseStrategy strategy, java.util.List<edu.wpi.first.math.Pair<PhotonCamera,​edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Transform3d>> cameras)
      Deprecated.
      Create a new RobotPoseEstimator.
      Parameters:
      aprilTags - A WPILib AprilTagFieldLayout linking AprilTag IDs to Pose3ds with respect to the FIRST field.
      strategy - The strategy it should use to determine the best pose.
      cameras - An ArrayList of Pairs of PhotonCameras and their respective Transform3ds from the center of the robot to the camera mount positions (ie, robot âž” camera).

      The updated estimated pose and the latency in milliseconds. Estimated pose may be null if no targets were seen
